Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

EAX_DISTORTION

The structure EAX_DISTORTION used to control the distortion filter in the EAX 4 3D provider

struct EAX_DISTORTION
{
  S32 Slot;
  S32 Volume;
  F32 Edge;
  S32 Gain;
  F32 LowPassCutOff;
  F32 EQCenter;
  F32 EQBandwidth;
};

In Members

Slot
specifies the slot to query or set. Distortion can use slot 2 and/or 3.
Volume
specifies the volume of this slot in standard EAX attenuation units (-10000 to 0 fixed point millibels, default 0.0).
Edge
controls the shape of the distortion (0.0 to 1.0, default 0.2).
Gain
specifies the low gain of this slot in standard EAX attenuation units (-6000 to 0 fixed point millibels, default -2600).
LowPassCutOff
specifies the cut-off of the filter pre-distortion in hertz (80.0 to 24000.0, default 8000).
EQCenter
specifies the center frequency of the EQ post-distortion in hertz (80.0 to 24000.0, default 3600).
EQBandwidth
specifies the bandwidth of the EQ post-distortion in hertz (80.0 to 24000.0, default 3600).

Discussion

See the EAX 4 documentation for technical details on this filter.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Sections: Creative's EAX 4 Preferences
Related Basic Types: F32, S32
